reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Northern Kenya Integrated Development Project NOTKID

description.narrative: 1. Project: 11278 Northern Kenya integrated development project (NOTKID) #2. Project area and Country: Counties of Baringo, parts of Turkana, West Pokot and Elgeiyo Marakwet.#3. Project justification: #Limited regional livelihood opportunities, drought and the lack of natural resources are the main conflict drivers between pastoralist communities in Northern Kenya. Formal peacebuilding structures, religious and traditional leaders have insufficient management structure and capacity to implement conflict res olutions and to promote peacebuilding.# 4. The main objective and expected results:#The project outcome is to enhance the targeted communities capacity to resolve Natural Resource Based conflicts in a non-violent manner and therefore contribute to reduced insecurity in the region. This will be achieved through the establishment of and support provided to formal and informal local peace building structures, strengthened collaboration between the government, private sector and the targeted local communities, and Peace Dividend Projects jointly implemented by the targeted communities. Income Generating Activities and the related livelihood trainings also contribute to maintaining regional peace. Womens participation in community dialogue and decision-making wil l be promoted through peace talking circles and women led forums.#5. Right-holders/ beneficiaries: 7070 men, 3030 women, 3000 boys and 2400 girls.#Duty-bearers: National government authorities such as the police, chiefs, and commissioners, county governmen t authorities, politicians and elites, as well as religious and traditional leaders.#6. Implementing partner: Self-implemented by Kenya Country Office in close collaboration with Catholic Dioceses of Eldoret, Kitale and Lodwar.
